attributes.review: this is by far the worst app I have ever downloaded in my life! Within minutes of downloading, it gave my phone three viruses. absolute trash. Just like the man who created it❤️
attributes.title: he tried it🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♀️💕 hopefully never again💛💝🤪

attributes.review: I was astonished to what I seen when I opened the app. 😐 this app precedes trumps reputation. I opened the app and it was a video of a group of turtles twerking. that’s not all there’s also a video of them holding the Frosted Flakes tiger hostage. I am traumatized and the world would benefit from the destruction of this app.
attributes.title: WORST APP ON THE PLANET

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so that I could support this DRIED UP ORANGE PEEL Oop I meant our beloved president. When I click on the app it starts glitching out and shows me a HORRIFYING picture of a 🍤. I literally can’t believe you guys would show something like that this app should be  REMOVED IMMEDIATELY 🤮🤮🤮.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE 🤮🤮

attributes.review: This app is very atrocious. Nothing loads quickly and I believe this app is full of people who aren’t the smartest. I think this app should be taken down because this is not the stuff I like to see in the app store.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I was so excited for this app but when I opened it the amount of orange on my screen was so overwhelming I started projectile vomoting, next day I noticed something was wrong, I went to the doctor and turns out I’m blind in one eye
attributes.title: Ruined my life.

attributes.review: I thought this was a driving game but it shows a man who reminds me a lot of hitler. This “game” has false advertisement and I would hate if anyone else had this happen to them. Just delete the whole app.
attributes.title: The hell is this?

attributes.review: I opened the app and my cheetos went missing so i looked for them but when i looked up at the screen there they were! On the screen with the cheeto centaur. Well anyways dont recommend the app if you breathe air.
attributes.title: No thanks bruv

attributes.review: I 😼 climbed 😜 out 🤬 of 🤢 my head 🖕🏻 and watched myself 🤪 implode a ❤️ thought without 🙋🏼 a body 🤩 aught to be ☺️ the shot 🔪 to take 🧚🏻 a load 🚶🏼‍♀️ off 🎎 my brain 🧠 is poison ☠️ and I’m lookin 😱 for the 😛 antidote 😃 but everytime 🥳 I find it 🤓 my defenses 🤖 scream oh no 🤦🏽‍♂️ you don’t

attributes.review: This app stinks😍 like peppers, and gross dirt, I opened it😝 and was very disappointed,💋 he’s even worse at making apps then he is at running a country😜 please delete this app from the store don’t even consider buying it💖
attributes.title: it’s a no from me💖

attributes.review: Horrible interface. Hateful images used. Makes you sign up? And for what? So I can get updates on when even more people’s rights are gonna get taken away?? Ugly inside and out.
attributes.title: horrifically awful
